phrases: Looks like the village where I lived with Pa.
Doubt if we will find a shard in a place like this.
Kagome... are you picking up any vibes from a Jewel Shard?
Well, let us split up and look around.
Are you going off alone to pick up some woman, Monk?
How can you be so callous?!
If there is a demon around, I will smell it!
He probably went off to play.
He is just a kid, after all.
Boy, the pains I go through!
We have been in a lot of battles lately.
They deserve to be alone for a change.
You stole the dried persimmon from my house!
When my brother comes home, you will all get it!
Your brother died long ago in the war!
My pa was with him when he died.
S- She was the culprit, after all.
You are strong, are not you?
So your pa is a raccoon-dog demon?
Satsuki, do not you have parents?
They died right after I was born.
But I have a big brother.
He is going to prove himself in battle and become a samurai...
then he is coming for me.
Even if he dies, he will come back alive.
Anything I wish on it will come true.
It is a piece of something called...
T- The Jewel of Four Souls?
It is a shard from the Jewel of Four Souls which grants any wish.
I will become a samurai without fail.
Brother would not lie to me.
Is my home possessed by some demon?
Yes, we must exorcise it immediately.
This is my duty as a monk.
I shall provide meals and a place to sleep for you all this night.
That Miroku... lying through his teeth again!
Shippo, how did you find us?
I figured Miroku would be performing an exorcism at
the finest-looking house in the village.
l-I found it... the Sacred Jewel Shard!
Listen, will you show me your shard?
You will not take it, will you?
If it is real, we will have to take it from her!
Is it okay to let her go?
Have you changed your mind about living here?
Brother will come home some day.
Shippo, that was a stone flower.
You can dig it up in the mountains.
It is not a Sacred Jewel Shard.
Her brother really is dead, but she will not believe it.
Please bring Brother back home soon.
I have told her to come live with us,
but she refuses to move from that hut she shared with her brother.
I was chased out of the headman's house,
but I can use that little girl.
The Sacred Jewel has the power to create incarnations of Naraku.
So if a wish is made on a real Sacred Jewel Shard,
will Satsuki's brother be resurrected and return home?
Shippo, you know just how frightening the Sacred Jewel is.
It is not something you give to humans.
Besides, why are you taking pity on that little girl?
So what if I am in love with her!
Flitting back and forth between Kikyo and Kagome!
You have waited a long time.
I knew that you would come home!
I will say good-bye at least.
I wonder if Satsuki will keep wishing on that fake shard?
But I cannot tell her the truth!
Is not he with that girl, Satsuki?
He was very worried about her.
but she has faith in that shard and keeps waiting.
He is hurt, but Brother's back.
It is all thanks to you and the Sacred Jewel Shard.
I made you suffer a long time.
I will make up for it now.
Oh, you are with the group staying at the headman's house.
Will not you bring it to me... the real Sacred Jewel Shard?
I have the Sacred Jewel Shard right here.
Cannot you tell... this is junk!
Now kid... go and get me the real Sacred Jewel Shard.
You coulda let her believe I was her brother.
It is a crawling, big-bellied demon.
We have got to go after Shippo!
Satsuki, I hope you got away!
You may have let the girl go, but it is useless.
I will do the same thing.
I will use you as a hostage to get a Sacred Jewel Shard.
Then why did not you come after me from the start?
Get a taste of my stomach acid!
Cannot I fight like the others?
Turned yourself into something weird again?!
I can test the Backlash Wave which I have just mastered!
Just what are you up to now?
Locate the demonic aura, twist it around the Wind Scar...
then reverse the flow- my new ultimate technique!
This opponent's demonic energy is too weak...
I cannot use the Backlash Wave!
You are just too weak, that is all!
This is the demon I exorcised from the headman's house last night.
When I arrived, the demon was already beaten to a pulp.
This demon figured he did not have a chance with us, so he used Satsuki.
Everyone who tries to use the Sacred Jewel encounters unhappiness.
I forgot that... and Satsuki suffered for it.
I have decided... to go live with the headman.
I knew all along that my brother was dead.
I am glad I met you!
I do not have a Ma or Pa either.
That is why I can go on living.
Was Shippo really in love with that girl?
He is little, but he is a man.
If you lag behind we will leave you!
All the men in a village are bewitched by a demon princess and will not return.
Miroku sets out alone to rescue them,
but his one weakness is... a beautiful woman.
Worried, Sango decides to follow him.
But deep in that mountain was a sad legend.
Next on Inuyasha: The Temptress in the Mist
